name: Break Mod
description: This mod reminds players to take breaks

interval.name: Interval
interval.description: This measures the amount of minutes between popups! **Time does not save between sessions**, so it is recommended you use 10 - 20 minutes!

breakTime.name: Break Time
breakTime.description: This measures the amount of seconds your counter will start counting down from when you take a break!

audioAlert.name: Use audio alerts
audioAlert.description: Enables sound effects to notify you when your timer is up!

useQuickSettings.name: Enable Settings Menu
useQuickSettings.description: Disables the button to open timer modificaitons and settings from pause menus.

playLayer.name: Play Layer
playLayer.description: This setting enables or disables whether or not the timer is used while playing levels!

editorLayer.name: Editor
editorLayer.description: This setting enables or disables whether or not the timer is active on the editor!
